text: And when some trouble comes to man; He cries to his Lord, turning to Him (the Lord) by feeling sorry for what he has done: But when He gives him (the man, a gift) of Mercy from Himself, (man) forgets what he cried and prayed for before, and he sets up rivals to Allah, so as to mislead others from His (Allahâ€™s) Path. Say (to such people): "Enjoy your disbelief for some time: Surely, you are from the companions of the Fire
